name: FNF - Vs. Kiryu Full Week
description:
Oh no! You were trying to have an nice date with your girlfriend at the bar but the Tojo Clan has shown up! Luckily the legendary Dragon of Dojima, Kazuma Kiryu has come to save us.

But, there's an issue. He can't let you leave unless you have a singing battle with him! Luckily, you are one of the best!
